pluginstrument.author: Sim Innovations
pluginstrument.description: This tach / hobbs meter can be used to show the tach time from the simulator, but it can also act as a local tach. This can be useful when you want to monitor your simulator time. When showing the local tach, it can start from zero, or show the total accumulated time. When letting it start from zero, you can still decide to let it count up the total local tach time or not.
